                      int dy)

        Parameters:

        dy - the desired y distance in pixels.

      • flip

        public void flip​(char d)
        Flips the piece vertically or horizontally.
        Parameters:
        d - Choose the way that piece will be flipped. 'v' to flip vertically or 'h' to flip horizontally.

      • reflect

        public void reflect​(char d)
        Reflect the piece respect to the choosen side
        Parameters:
        d - The side with which the piece'll be reflected. n: top side, s: low side, e: rigth side, w: left side
